snippet: The audit found a 23 percent jump in improper spending at time of sharp budget cuts and rising public doubts about the benefits of European integration.
lead_paragraph: The audit found a 23 percent jump in improper spending at time of sharp budget cuts and rising public doubts about the benefits of European integration.

headline.main: E.U. Watchdog Assails Irregularities in Spending
headline.print_headline: E.U. Watchdog Assails Irregularities in Spending
